SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT A.USER_NICKNAME, B.BUY_DATE, C.MOVIE_TITLE, C.MOVIE_PRICE, B.BUY_STATUS FROM MVY_USER A, MVY_BUY B, MVY_MOVIE C
AND A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO AND B.MOVIE_NO = C.MOVIE_NO AND A.USER_NO = #{userNo}) M

SELECT BUY.USER_NICKNAME, BUY.BUY_DATE, BUY.MOVIE_TITLE, BUY.MOVIE_PRICE, BUY.BUY_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, M.USER_NICKNAME, M.BUY_DATE, M.MOVIE_TITLE, M.MOVIE_PRICE, M.BUY_STATUS FROM (SELECT A.USER_NICKNAME, B.BUY_DATE, C.MOVIE_TITLE, C.MOVIE_PRICE, B.BUY_STATUS FROM MVY_USER A, MVY_BUY B, MVY_MOVIE C
AND A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO AND B.MOVIE_NO = C.MOVIE_NO AND A.USER_NO = #{userNo}) M ) BUY WHERE BUY.RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
